summary: This document is a Certificate of Existence issued by Gregory R. Francis, the Lieutenant Governor of the Virgin Islands, confirming that PLAN D, LLC was duly organized under the laws of the United States Virgin Islands on October 19, 2012. It states that the company is in good standing and has not filed Articles of Termination.

persons.name: Gregory R. Francis
persons.context: Gregory R. Francis is the Lieutenant Governor of the Virgin Islands who issued the Certificate of Existence for PLAN D, LLC.

events.title: Formation of PLAN D, LLC
events.description: PLAN D, LLC filed Articles of Organization with the Office of the Lieutenant Governor.

events.title: Issuance of Certificate of Existence
events.description: The Lieutenant Governor issued a Certificate of Existence confirming the good standing of PLAN D, LLC.

keyFacts: PLAN D, LLC was organized under the laws of the United States Virgin Islands on October 19, 2012.
The company has paid all applicable fees and is in good standing.
No Articles of Termination have been filed for PLAN D, LLC.
